Description:
Great location & investment in Corio
Sitting on a generous allotment of 618sqm, Situated in a growth suburb of Corio this property is a must to inspect. This 3 bedroom home is waiting for the new owners to renovate or develop (STCA).
With a spacious, open plan kitchen, dining / living area with Gas heater and central bathroom, this little gem still has a lot of love to give.
Comprising of spacious front lounge room with solid hardwood floors, ceiling fan and gas heating system for all year round comfort. A neat functional &update kitchen with new built in oven and pantry and ample storage. There is also a separate dinning space seating up to 4 near the kitchen. Down the hall you will find 3 generous size bedrooms with brand new carpet throughout, two with BIR's, one room with plenty of ceiling storage space.
Outside you have a pergola area ideal for entertaining and a large rear yard perfect for children / pets. Other features include a large laundry with bench and cupboard and wood-garden shed and double garage, spacious parking space in the drive way.
Located within walking distance to schools, shops & public transport.
Only moments from the Corio Central Shopping Centre and minutes to the Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne and Surf Coast commuters and just around the corner from the Princes Highway.
Convenient location and full of potential, this property is definitely worth considering.
Insights: 9 Buangor Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER OFFER!
An incredible investment opportunity with potential future development (STCA), the time is now for you to invest and prosper in this high growth locale. Built in 1960, and boasting a classic vintage charm, you'll love every inch of this 3-bedroom home.
Presenting a large verandah before entry, stylish floorboards throughout, a spacious lounge room, an open plan kitchen and dining area, a central bathroom, and built-in-robes in 2 of the bedrooms, what more could you ask for?
Ideally suited for those looking to enter the market or expand their investment portfolio, this property is currently tenanted to long term tenants wishing to stay, or the option is there for vacant possession also.
Located in a family-friendly street and only minutes away from the Corio Shopping Village, transport, local schools, sporting facilities, as well as quick access to the Ring Road, you're in a prime location that's just too good to pass up on.
Suzanna Levic is just a phone call away on 0490816017. Get in fast to inspect this brilliant opportunity.
Features
Approx. 613m2 allotment
Built in 1960
3 Bedrooms (2 with Built-in-Robes)
Potential development opportunity (STCA)
Heating
Single garage
Up to 4 off-street Parking space
Insights: 30 Donax Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Fabulous First Step!
Look no further, your perfect downsizer, smart investment or ideal first home is right here! This affordable Corio residence offers immediately comfortable accommodation in a spacious complex.
A tasteful renovation offers universal appeal with the added benefit of generous older style proportions. A spacious open plan living room and dining, with a modern kitchen presenting quality appliances and ample cupboard space including a double pantry.
Two spacious bedrooms featuring built in robes and the master bedroom with direct access to the large and tastefully presented two-way bathroom with separate shower and bath. Additionally, this home offers warm neutral tones throughout with a split system heating and cooling, additional gas heating and ceiling fan.
Delivering a private and perfect entertaining area; a laid-back haven for relaxing outdoors; with a decked undercover pergola that blends beautifully with the recently landscaped yard, modern stained planter boxes, garden sheds and even new turf! A fantastic unit finished off with your own single garage in a perfect little pocket of Corio.
This property is positioned for maximum convenience; close to schools, easy access to the Ring Road for the keen commuter, public transport and the bustling Corio shopping precinct, offering all the services you could want and need. In a sought-after pocket, this property should be at the top of your inspection list for 2019!
Whether you move in or buy for investment, this property will not disappoint and you can relax knowing all the hard work has been done.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Located in a quiet street close to local amenities with easy access to the Geelong ring road and local shopping centre.

Description:
As Bright As The Morning Sunshine
Whether you are looking for a family home or an ideal investment property this home ticks all the boxes. Located minutes from Corio Village Shopping Centre, Ring Road, schools, Water World Aquatic centre and other sort after amenities this property presents an ideal buying opportunity. Featuring 3 BRs with BIRs, all serviced by a central updated bathroom. The front living room is a bright and airy open plan room that flows through to the updated kitchen, meals / 2 living area which are adjacent to the undercover out door entertainment area and the rear yard which is set securely behind high gates creating a safe place for kids to play. With features such as gas heating, air conditioning, garage with remote control access and immaculate low maintenance gardens this home will appeal to just about any buyer - so come along and take a look for yourself.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
The Renovated Gem
Located close to all of the ameneties that Corio has to offer is this property in a prime location for commuters with easy access to the ring road, Melbourne under an hour and Geelong's CBD just 15 minutes. Public transport nearby going both North to Lara and South to the rest of Greater Geelong, Corio Central less than 5 minutes away providing all the essentials + more!
- 3 great sized bedrooms, 2 with BIRs
- Renovated kitchen with 4 burner gas cooktop, electric oven and an abundance of storage
- Light filled living area
- Central full bathroom
- Hardwood Flooring
- Split system heating and cooling
- Undercover pergola
- Double gated side access to single lock up garage
- 543 sqm block
- Approximate rental return of $310 per week

Description:
Spacious 4 bedroom home set on 801sqm
This spacious four bedroom family home offers fantastic living both inside and out. The generous lounge room set at the rear of the home looks out over the undercover entertaining area and offers access to the galley kitchen and large meals area while the bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom with bath and separate shower. Set on 801sqm of land the huge backyard has ample space for the kids to play or store a boat, caravan or to host family and friends with undercover entertaining area complete with spa. Other features include central heating throughout, air conditioning and large lock up garage set behind secure gates. Nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac with a park at the end of the court and just a short stroll to Corio Village, local schools, doctors surgeries and transport, all you could need is easily accessible. With scope to sub divide and develop due to the "high density zoning" this prime piece of real estate offers so many options as a great family home, investment or development project in a quiet and convenient setting.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Great opportunity in booming Corio.
What a fantastic opportunity to secure this sophisticated home packed with features on a huge 752m2 (approx.) parcel of land. Offering a fresh new look in the always growing Corio area it is perfectly suited for first home buyers or investors looking to add to their portfolio.
Entering the home you are greeted by beautiful polished floorboards throughout the entire home. Comprising of 3 large bedrooms (2 with BIRs), a centrally located bathroom with separate toilet, a fantastic kitchen/dining area featuring a dishwasher, stainless steel oven and plenty of cupboard space and a great lounge area with split system and ceiling fan.
Outside you will find a low maintenance rear yard with a small garden shed and a single car carport allowing for off street parking. Located a few minutes walk to Beckley Park and only a short drive to the Corio Central Shopping Centre, do not miss out on what is a great property. Enquire today before it sells.

Description:
A Real Surprise Package
This solid brick family home with great street appeal has been meticulously maintained both inside and out and offers a flexible floor plan. Decorated in neutral tones with stunning timber floors throughout, this home is warm and inviting. Perfect for the young family and a fantastic option for the first home buyer. Offering 2 spacious living areas this home provides a terrific amount of space and is perfect for the growing family. The open plan kitchen is particularly appealing including a fantastic 900mm gas stainless steel stove and plenty of cabinetry with laminated benchtops and adjoins the dining area and will appeal to anyone who loves to entertain. The generous backyard is ideal for kids and pets to play and roam in safety. This home has everything that the growing family needs and will not last long.

Description:
Stylishly Updated and Ready To Move In!
On the fringe of the popular Cloverdale Estate, this stylishly renovated family home set on a large allotment of 760m2 (approx) is the whole package.
4 Good sized bedrooms, large ensuite with spa bath and walk in robe with added storage to master.
Beautifully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ample bench and cupboard space plus large island stone benchtop & concealed walk-in pantry, adjoining is the open plan living & dining area with floating laminate flooring. Cleaning is a breeze with the ducted vacuuming system.
Landscaped and manicured lawns to the large yard. Rear access through the secure gates to the 10x6m powered garage, perfect for storing all those extra toys or the perfect man cave.
With easy access to the Ring Road and Geelong CBD. Walking distance from schools, transport & the shopping center makes this property a must see!
Key Features
- 4 Bedrooms
- 2 living areas, open plan and forms lounge with dining adjoining
- Large walk-in robe with added storage and ensuite to master bedroom
- 2 bathrooms, ensuite offers a spa bath and double vanity
- Modern kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances, and concealed walk-in pantry
- Ducted vacuuming
- 10x6m powered 4 car garage with potbelly fire & double roller doors
- Gas ducted heating
- Large 760m2 Block (approx) with large rear yard
- Down lights throughout
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Superb Opportunity!
This one-bedroom unit in superb condition is the perfect offering of location, lifestyle and versatility. Currently vacant, it presents a variety of options including tenancy or owner-occupy. Move-in ready, the entrance opens onto an ample interior where the contrast of dark wood joinery and white walls offers a striking setting. Enhanced by heating and cooling, a large lounge/living space flows through to a functional kitchen featuring servery; wrap-around bench, plentiful cabinetry and upright oven with gas stove. An adjacent tiled wet room provides shower and wall-mounted vanity. The spacious outdoor area and single carport are additional highlights. Perfectly positioned close to all amenities, this residence boasts a convenient and coveted locale.

Description:
Quality Living or Investment
Located just seconds to the Geelong Ring Road, Princes Highway and close proximity to further amenities such as quality schools, sporting facilities and Corio Shopping Centre makes this property one that should be on top of your shopping list. Purchase one or purchase both and collect the rent in an area known for constant capital growth or rent one and move into the other. The property consists of 2 modern units both on separate titles and with no body corporate fees. Both units offer 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes. The large open plan design incorporates a neat spacious kitchen with stainless steel cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and large pantry accompanied with the spacious open plan light filled living/dining area in addition to a central bathroom, separate toilet, laundry, double garage with internal access, split system heating and cooling and ample storage. Unit 1 is being sold with vacant position and Unit 2 is being sold with a first-class tenant in place on a periodic lease. With the outstanding value on offer, don't miss this remarkable opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 1/48 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A luxurious lifestyle.
Presenting this exquisite, fully renovated four bedroom residence situated on a 613m2 (approx.) block with seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining, set in beautifully manicured gardens in the heart of Corio.
The home comprises of 2 spacious light filled lounge areas ideal for large families, as well as 4 generous bedrooms with BIRs (master with ensuite). The impressive main bathroom and separate laundry are centrally located and the tailored kitchen
meets the most demanding needs coming complete with dishwasher and ample bench space overlooking the lounge/dining area.
Step outside into your own private outdoor alfresco entertainment area perfect for entertaining family or friends. If that wasn't enough, an additional “man cave” is available in the double car garage with shed/workshop at the rear of the property and off street parking is assured in the large driveway.
Offering additional extras such as ducted heating, air conditioning and much more this home has been renovated to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle.
Located in an established neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves and all major amenities are within easy reach. Close by to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters, what more could you want?
To truly appreciate the detail this stunning property offers inspections are a must! Don't hesitate, secure this remarkable family home today.
Insights: 1 Amanda Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat investment or first home.
This extremely convenient location will be sure to please, nestled away in a quiet court location yet so close to everything! If you are a first home buyer or an astute investor, here is the perfect opportunity. With a neat exterior, upon entry, the home comprises of a comfortable lounge which flows through to the practical kitchen, with three bedrooms in total serviced by the central bathroom. The charming brick veneer home provides secure parking with a double garage at the rear with a generous grassed rear yard for the whole family to enjoy. Situated on an allotment of 619m2 (approx.) with easy access to all amenities, public transport, schools, Corio Shopping Centre and a great location for access to the Princes Highway. This property should definitely be on top of your inspection list, call today before it's too late.
Insights: 5 Ayr Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding proportions in superb court location.
Standing proudly in a quiet location, this four bedroom residence is a welcome find for those seeking a new family abode. Set on an astounding 966m2 (approx.) allotment, ideal for those seeking all the accommodation the family could ever want and need with big extras. The possibilities are endless and we will welcome all buyers to inspect. This delightful light filled, immaculately presented residence consists of four bedrooms, study, central bathroom, three living areas including lounge/dining and neat kitchen. Externally the home boasts a charming wrap-around veranda surrounded by established gardens and lawn for children or pets to enjoy, as well as an extended 7.4m X 9m four car garage at the rear of the property. A super central location, close to local schools and shops while being also convenient to Corio Shopping Centre, Bell Post Hill Shopping Centre and Ring Road access. This is an outstanding home in a family friendly location that is absolutely ideal for first home buyers, families and investors alike.
Insights: 21 Redfearn Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
